query: 如图,△ABC,AB=8,AC=5,BC=7,AD是△ABC外角平分线,CD⊥AD于D,E是BC的中点,则DE=()选项：['7', '6.5', '6', '5.5']
answer: 【解答】解:如图,延长CD交BA的延长线于F,∵AD是△ABC的外角平分线,CD⊥AD,∴∠CAD=∠FAD,∠ADC=∠ADF=90°,在△ACD和△AFD中,≥ft\{\begin{array}{l}{∠{CAD}=∠{FAD}}\\{{AD}={AD}}\\{∠{ADC}=∠{ADF}=90°},∴△ACD≌△AFD(ASA),∴CD=DF,AC=AF,∴AB+AC=BF,∵E是BC的中点,∴DE是△BCF的中位线,∴DE=\frac{1}{2}BF=\frac{1}{2}(AB+AC)=\frac{13}{2}=6.5；
